Mayor & Town Council
--------------------

**[Mayor and Town Council](https://www.littleelm.gov/525/Mayors-Welcome-and-Town-Council-Bios "Mayor and Town Council")**

Learn more about the boards, committees, and commissions that assist the Town Council.

1. [Mayor's Welcome and Town Council](https://www.littleelm.gov/525/Mayors-Welcome-and-Town-Council)

   1. [Mayor Curtis J. Cornelious](https://www.littleelm.gov/869/Mayor-Curtis-J-Cornelious)
   2. [At Large Place 1 Council Member Jamell T. Johnson](https://www.littleelm.gov/1504/At-Large-Place-1-Council-Member-Jamell-T)
   3. [Mayor Pro Tem & District 2 Council Member Tony Singh](https://www.littleelm.gov/870/Mayor-Pro-Tem-District-2-Council-Member-)

   5. [District 4 Council Member Idalia Maria Amaya](https://www.littleelm.gov/874/District-4-Council-Member-Idalia-Maria-A)
   6. [Deputy Mayor Pro Tem & District 5 Council Member Andrew Evans](https://www.littleelm.gov/1587/Deputy-Mayor-Pro-Tem-District-5-Council-)
   7. [At Large Place 6 Council Member Michel Hambrick](https://www.littleelm.gov/1586/At-Large-Place-6-Council-Member-Michel-H)

* [Watch Town Council live during meetings. All recordings are Town property.](https://www.littleelm.gov/1258/Agendas-Minutes-Videos)
* [Access the new online payment system 24-hours a day, seven days a week! In addition to basic contact information, anyone paying a water bill will need their account number and customer number found on your water bill.](https://www.littleelm.gov/1379/Online-Bill-Pay-Options)



* [We’re home to the sun on your face, drink in your hand, sitting outside laughing with your best friends kind of feeling that doesn’t end when the summer fades.](https://lakefrontlittleelm.com/)
